term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - variational transition state theory
term.title: variational transition state theory

item.text: This expression is applied to modifications of conventional transition state theory in which the position of the dividing surface in the potential-energy surface is varied. The rate is calculated with the surface at various positions, and the lowest rate calculated is taken to be closest to the truth.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 149. 'A glossary of terms used in chemical kinetics, including reaction dynamics (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 190 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668010149)
